refferals.text:
You can attract new users and get a bonus for them.
To do this, copy the link in the box below this block. Place a link with information about ICO on other resources.
When your referral is registered in the Dashboard, we will know that it came via your link.
After he buys tokens, you get 5% of the tokens from his investment.
Attract new investors and get bonuses!

help.title: I see tokens in my account, but in my Ethereum-purse they do not. What to do?
help.text: Do not worry. All your purchases are displayed in your personal account and tokens will be credited to your wallet after the completion of the ICO.

help.title: When will I receive the purchased tokens?
help.text: Immediately after the end of the ICO, the tokens will be sent.

help.title: What is the minimum deposit amount?
help.text: The minimum deposit amount is 0.001 ETH.
